title: Cumberland Gap National Historical Park: Things To Know Before You Come
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Know Before You Come             Things To Know Before You Come         Cabin at the historic Hensley Settlement Photo by Chuck Summers  Come experience the beauty and solitude of the southern mountains! The story of early pioneers; settlers and soldiers; pristine mountain streams; sights and sounds of wildlife; pastoral landscapes- all can be found while exploring Cumberland Gap National Historical Park.
